overview_of_class: COURSE DESCRIPTION /  Dynamcs of soils and soil-foundation systems; nuclear weapon effects, earthquake response, vibrations of machine foundations reactions due to impact equipment, industrial noise and blast effects, fatigue concepts, wave propagation and attenuation, blast-resistant construction, and linear and nonlinear systems.
name: Soil Dynamics
title: MEAS CIV_ENV 458-0-1 Soil Dynamics

descriptions.value: COURSE DESCRIPTION / Dynamcs of soils and soil-foundation systems; nuclear weapon effects, earthquake response, vibrations of machine foundations reactions due to impact equipment, industrial noise and blast effects, fatigue concepts, wave propagation and attenuation, blast-resistant construction, and linear and nonlinear systems.

1. Geotechnical Earthquake Engineering / Steven L. Kramer / ISBN 978-0133749434 / 1996 / 1st / Prentice Hall.
